text: Eat Drink Man Woman () is a 1994 comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Ang Lee. It starred Sihung Lung, Yu-wen Wang, Chien-lien Wu, and Kuei-mei Yang. The movie was released on 3 August 1994. It was both a critical and box office success. In 1994, the movie received the Asia Pacific Film Festival Award for Best Film. In 1995 it received an Academy Award nomination for Best Foreign Language Film. Category:1994 comedy-drama movies Category:Taiwanese movies Category:Movies directed by Ang Lee
title: Eat Drink Man Woman
